items.message: This flood alert has been removed as conditions have improved. We will continue to monitor the forecast and re-issue this alert if necessary.

items.description: Rivers Yeo and Parrett, downstream of Yeovil to Steart
items.message: The River Yeo level at Huish Episcopi pumping station is 7.61 m and is stable. The drain level at Huish Episcopi pumping station is 7.02m and is stable. Flooding will affect the road from Langport to Muchelney if this level exceeds 7.3 m, the road from Muchelney to Long load if this level exceeds 7.86 and the road from Muchelney to Thorney if this level exceeds 7.93 m. Property flooding is possible if this level exceeds 8.35 m. Pumping will begin at Huish Episcopi pumping station when levels in the river allow. Furter rainfall is forecast for Monday, 21/11/2022. We are closely monitoring the situation. This message will be updated at 12:00 on Monday, 21/11/2022 or as the situation changes.
